attributes.title: PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I want to start off by saying that this app is so incredibly dangerous. After I downloaded it (which took 10 days) it installed 347 viruses onto my phone!!! I had so pop-ups in safari that my phone eventually glitched out and i saw the terrible black screen. I took my phone to the apple store and they said it was unfixable and a $700 phone turned into a $10 phone only to be RECYCLED. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app took three days to download. I really just wanted to stay updated on trump since I just turned 18 and I’m gonna vote this election. Once I started using the app, I realized it was so disorganized and horrible and ugly and it actually broke my phone. I can’t call my mom anymore to tell her I love her bc if this app. This app is destroying families. Please get rid of it so that it doesn’t ruin any more relationships.

attributes.title: it’s like a virus and a hacker had a baby and shitted all over my phone
attributes.review: This app is the most disgusting app I’ve ever downloaded, it took FOREVER to even process the request to download, and EVEN LONGER to get it onto my phone. My phone immediately crashed the second I opened the app, and took hours to let me be able to open it back up. Worst app I’ve ever had, DEFINITELY don’t recommend.

attributes.title: Crashed my phone
attributes.review: This app glitched my phone and it has been crashing every five minutes now. How am I supposed to watch Fox News and see all the twitter posts that my wonderful president it spouting every time a thought occasionally graces his head? It also took up so much space I had to delete all my photos! And then it crashed! All those memories gone forever!!

attributes.title: ✨disgustang✨
attributes.review: It took 6 days to download, glitched the hell out of my phone, started beeping, hacked my email, texted me threats, killed my cat and paralyzed me from the waist down. Ever since The incident happened I’ve been having visions of Donald trump licking my elbows and copping my left foot off😰😰😰.The only thing that has been keeping me sane is watching 365 dni. If I could rate it 0 stars I would. I will be calling corporate soon

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i thought it would make my phone great again. i was very disappointed. it built a fence between my neighbor’s and my house and told my neighbor to pay for it. it deported all of the pets out of my house because they weren’t born there. it assaulted all my female friends and lied about it. it also all my spray tan went missing after i downloaded this app. one day i found a trail of cheeto dust leading to a bunker. i looked into the bunker and found a fat oompa loompa. i didn’t investigate the bunker but i heard someone tweeting down there. it smelled like racism, homophobia, transphobia, islamophobia, xenophobia, and misogyny. long story short, don’t download this app.

attributes.title: Worst app ever!! It should get deleted
attributes.review: When I first opened this app it was just a black screen it wouldn’t let me press anything!! My phone broke it wouldn’t let me press out of the app:( I had to get new phone, then it wasn’t working on my new phone. Then I found out I had a virus 😡If you download this app you will get a whole virus then you have to waste your savings for a new phone

attributes.title: AWFUL APP!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it look TWO DAYS to download 😿😭 I was hoping that this app would help me gather info for the up coming election but when I went to put in my phone number the app decided to shut down and my phone CAUGHT ON FIRE!!!🔥🔥🔥🙀 it was strange because before it caught on fire the app was playing this weird song i think the lyrics were foreigner????idk I couldn’t tell😾 anyways DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!👎😓

attributes.title: absolutely unhelpful and crashes my phone
attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!! I wanted to keep up with trumps campaign and thought the app would be useful, but the app kept over heating my phone and is very laggy, it crashed a few times and my phone never does this but it kept freezing and turning off. undownloading. very poorly made and unhelpful. the president can do better. i do not recommend at all.

attributes.title: This app made America worse🤢🤮
attributes.review: I downloaded this app just to write this review because this app is the worse app in America and I see why because it belongs to the orange🍊 with pelo de elote 🌽 I hate him so muchhhh he can die for all I care hopefully the Simpsons don’t lie and they make another true prediction 😌RIP Trump and btw Gen Z will come for you if you ban Tiktok soooo if I were you I would keep it and I would hate myself if I were you 🤷‍♀️
